questions.question: Runge Kutta method 2nd order is used to solve
The formulation used for Runge Kutta method 2nd order is

answers.c: $$ \begin{aligned} s_1 &= hf(x_1, y_1) \\ s_2 &= hf(x_1+h, y_1 + s_1) \\ y_2 &= y_1 + \frac{(s_1 + s_2)}{2} \end{aligned} $$
answers.d: $$\begin{aligned} s_1 &= hf(x_1, y_1) \\ s_2 &= hf\left(x_1 + \frac{h}{2} , y_1 + \frac{s_1}{2}\right) \\ s_3 &= hf\left(x_1 + \frac{h}{2}, y_1 + \frac{s_2}{2}\right) \\ s_4 &= hf(x_1+h, y_1 + s_3) \\ y_2 &= y_1 + \frac{(s_1 + 2s_2 + 2s_3 + s_4)}{6} \end{aligned} $$
